DOC.brief_summary: This project aim test feasibility practical physical activity intervention postpartum woman , incorporate use body weight worn typical daily activity .
DOC.detailed_description: We pilot 3-arm , unblinded , randomize control trial postpartum woman ; 10 participant study group . Women recruit 2-6 month postpartum , intervention last 12 month postpartum . Data collection include:1 ) Physical activity ; 2 ) Maternal body composition ; 3 ) Questionnaires assess : motivation adopt healthy behavior , body attitude , infant feeding practice ; 4 ) Process evaluation ass : like dislike intervention program , suggestion improve intervention , reason leave study . The propose study time period 6 month study recruitment , 18 month carry study , 6 month data analysis ( total 2 year ) .
DOC.criteria: 26 month postpartum woman Premature birth History serious illness Medically incapable lowintensity exercise Currently take medication cause weight loss
